meanings.definition: Cinematographers: People who are responsible for the visual aspects of a film, including lighting, framing, and camera movement.
meanings.sent1: The cinematographers carefully set up the lights for the movie scene.
meanings.sent2: The cinematographers won an award for their outstanding work on the film.
meanings.sent3: The cinematographers joked that they could make a movie in the dark with their eyes closed!
meanings.sent4: The cinematographers painted the screen with light, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The cinematographers transformed the ordinary into the extraordinary with their camera skills.
